scripts.rename:project: git rebase --interactive --root; <# 1. Choose edit branch root, 2. Change name in `package.json` #>; git submodule update --recursive; git commit --no-edit --amend --all; git rebase --continue
scripts.create:lib: npm run create:lib --workspace=src; New-Item -Path lib/ -Type Junction -Value (Resolve-Path $pwd/src/lib/ | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Path)
scripts.new:url: git submodule set-url src https://github.com/sangafabrice/rollup-plugin-minify-template.git && git submodule update --init
scripts.flow:stop: flow stop; while (@(Stop-Process -Name flow -Force -PassThru -ErrorAction Ignore).Length) { Start-Sleep -Seconds 2 }
scripts.demo: cd demo/ ; babel rollup.config.js --out-file rollup.config.mjs --presets @babel/preset-flow --plugins babel-plugin-syntax-hermes-parser; Remove-Item dist -Recurse -ErrorAction Ignore; rollup --config
